import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Footer from '../layout/Footer'; import Header from '../layout/Header'; const Giohang = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const carts = useSelector((state) => state.cart.cart); let soluong = 0; let price = 0; carts?.forEach((item) => { soluong += item.qty; price += item.qty * item.gia; }); return (
